[ Font : Spoqa Han Sans ]
https://spoqa.github.io/spoqa-han-sans/en-US/
(Used as image font in demo)

Spoqa Han Sans fonts are open source.
All Spoqa Han Sans fonts are published under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.
